Name: The Wanderer
About the game: Life is on the brink of extinction, what horrible circumstances have led to this? You're a little robot, programmed to wander alone. What purpose do you serve? Why has the world come to this point? The Wanderer is an exploration focused game full of discoveries; the consequences of greed, and taking fate into your own hands. To whoever chooses to play The Wanderer: Thank you! This game is built to be played at your own pace, take your time and look around. I truly hope you enjoy the little experience I've put together!
